welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Horseheads, a charming town known for its scenic beauty and historic landmarks. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Elmira Corning Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Elmira Corning Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tompkins County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tompkins County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
